definition: A formal agreement or arrangement made between two or more individuals, typically used in professional or official contexts. It is commonly employed to establish a mutual understanding, set terms, or clarify expectations regarding a specific matter.

examples.german: Die Abrede war, dass wir uns um 8 Uhr treffen.
examples.english: The agreement was that we would meet at 8 o'clock.

examples.german: Wir haben eine Abrede getroffen, um die Kosten zu teilen.
examples.english: We made an agreement to share the costs.
